original_text: And it shall be, when thou shalt hear a sound of going in the tops of the mulberry trees, that then thou shalt go out to battle: for God is gone forth before thee to smite the host of the Philistines.
korean_text: 뽕나무 꼭대기에서 걸음 걷는 소리가 들리거든 곧 나가서 싸우라 너보다 하나님이 앞서 나아가서 블레셋 사람들의 군대를 치리라 하신지라

sentences.original_text: when thou shalt hear a sound of going
in the tops of the mulberry trees
that then thou shalt go out to battle
for God is gone forth before thee
to smite the host of the Philistines
